metadata.title: PM appreciates security forces for killing 25 terrorists

content.article_body: LAHORE, Oct 26 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday appreciated security forces for successfully carrying out operations against 'Fitna-Al-khawarij' (terrorists) in North Waziristan and Kurram districts. The premier praised the security forces for killing 25 terrorists in the operations. Shehbaz Sharif also paid tributes to five security personnel who embraced martyrdom while fighting terrorists during the operations. The prime minister prayed that may Allah Almighty elevate the ranks of martyrs and expressed condolences to their families.He said, "The entire nation salutes the security forces." He reaffirmed the determination to completely eliminate all types of terrorism from the country.
